add_followup_instruction.description: Adds follow-up instructions to a running cloud agent

props.name: text
props.description: The follow-up instruction text for the agent

props.name: images
props.description: Optional images to include with the instruction (max 5)

props.name: image
props.description: Image file

props.name: width
props.description: Image width in pixels

props.name: height
props.description: Image height in pixels

delete_agent.description: Delete a cloud agent. This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

find_agent_status.description: Retrieve the current status and results of a cloud agent

launch_agent.description: Start a new cloud agent to work on your repository

props.name: promptText
props.description: The instruction text for the agent

props.name: images
props.description: Optional images to include with the prompt (max 5)

props.name: image
props.description: Image file

props.name: width
props.description: Image width in pixels

props.name: height
props.description: Image height in pixels

props.name: model
props.description: The LLM to use (e.g., claude-4-sonnet). Leave empty to use the default model.

props.name: repository
props.description: GitHub repository URL (e.g., https://github.com/your-org/your-repo)

props.name: ref
props.description: Git ref (branch name, tag, or commit hash) to use as the base branch

props.name: autoCreatePr
props.description: Automatically create a pull request when the agent completes

props.name: openAsCursorGithubApp
props.description: Open the pull request as the Cursor GitHub App instead of as the user. Only applies if auto-create PR is enabled.

props.name: skipReviewerRequest
props.description: Skip adding the user as a reviewer to the pull request. Only applies if auto-create PR is enabled and opened as Cursor GitHub App.

props.name: branchName
props.description: Custom branch name for the agent to create

props.name: webhookUrl
props.description: URL to receive webhook notifications about agent status changes

props.name: webhookSecret
props.description: Secret key for webhook payload verification (minimum 32 characters)

agent_pull_request_created.description: Triggers when a background agent creates a pull request

agent_status_changed_webhook.description: Triggers when an agent status changes (ERROR or FINISHED). Configure this webhook URL when launching an agent.

props.name: webhookSecret
props.description: Optional webhook secret for signature verification. Must match the secret used when launching the agent.

agent_status_equals.description: Triggers when a Cursor agent has the specified status (e.g., "FINISHED", "FAILED")

props.name: status
props.description: The status to watch for

new_agent_conversation_message.description: Triggers when a new message appears in a specific agent\

new_agent.description: Triggers when a new Cursor agent is created or when agent status changes
